ggbscript.onUpdate: If(χHarmonic==false && abs(x(N)-nh)<εsnap,SetCoords(N,nh,0)) UpdateConstruction() If(χHarmonic,SetCoords(P, ph, 0)) Execute(cmdmNPcClean)
If(χHarmonic==false && abs(x(P)-ph)<εsnap,SetCoords(P,ph,0)) UpdateConstruction() If(χHarmonic,SetCoords(N, nh,0)) Execute(cmdmNPcClean)
If(χHarmonic==false && abs(x(I)-dh) < εsnap, SetCoords(I,dh,0)) UpdateConstruction() If(χHarmonic,SetCoords(E,eh,0)) Execute(cmdmNPcClean)

If(χHarmonic, If(ManMoves(1)=="N", SetCoords(N,nh,0), If(ManMoves(1)=="P", SetCoords(P,ph,0), If(ManMoves(1)=="E", SetCoords(E,eh,0), If(ManMoves(1)=="I", SetCoords(I,dh,0), 0)))), 0) RunUpdateScript(cr)

ggbscript.val: SetValue(χHarmonic, false) SetCoords(N, -1,0) SetCoords(P, 1,0) SetCoords(I, 0,0) SetCoords(E, 7,0) SetCoords(V, 0,4) SetCoords(N', (2 x(N)+x(V))/3, (2 y(N)+y(V))/3) SetCoords(P', (x(P)+x(V))/2, (y(P)+y(V))/2)

expression.label: txtMovables
expression.exp: "Movables: h(N, P, I, E), V, ℓ(N', P')"

input.a2: If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, (2 * n) - e, If[e ≠ e ∨ abs(e) ≟ Infinity, (n + p) / 2, (((2 * n) * p) - ((n + p) * e)) / (n + p - (2 * e))]]
If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, (2 * n) - d, If[d ≠ d ∨ abs(d) ≟ Infinity, (n + p) / 2, (((2 * n) * p) - ((n + p) * d)) / (n + p - (2 * d))]]
If[d ≠ d ∨ abs(d) ≟ Infinity, (2 * e) - p, If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, (d + e) / 2, (((2 * d) * e) - ((d + e) * p)) / (e + d - (2 * p))]]
If[d ≠ d ∨ abs(d) ≟ Infinity, (2 * e) - n, If[n ≠ n ∨ abs(n) ≟ Infinity, (d + e) / 2, (((2 * d) * e) - ((d + e) * n)) / (d + e - (2 * n))]]
If[d ≠ d ∨ abs(d) ≟ Infinity, (e - n) / (e - p), If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, (e - n) / (d - n), If[n ≠ n ∨ abs(n) ≟ Infinity, (d - p) / (e - p), (((e - n) * (d - p))) / (((d - n) * (e - p)))]]]

If[x(I') ≠ x(I') ∨ abs(x(I')) ≟ Infinity, mN'E' / mP'E', If[x(N') ≠ x(N') ∨ abs(x(N')) ≟ Infinity, mP'I' / mP'E', If[x(P') ≠ x(P') ∨ abs(x(P')) ≟ Infinity, mN'E' / mN'I', ((mN'E' * mP'I')) / ((mN'I' * mP'E'))]]]

expression.label: txtCrossRatio
expression.exp: "(N,P;E,I)=\frac{NE\cdot PI}{NI\cdot PE}=" + (LaTeX[cr]) + "=\frac{" + (LaTeX[e - n]) + "\times" + (LaTeX[d - p]) + "}{" + (LaTeX[d - n]) + "\times" + (LaTeX[e - p]) + "}"

ggbscript.onUpdate: If(SelectedElement(Parallels)=="ℓ ∥ VE", SetCoords(P',x(P'p),y(P'p)), If(SelectedElement(Parallels)=="ℓ ∥ VI", SetCoords(N',x(N'p),y(N'p)), If(SelectedElement(Parallels)=="VI ∥ h", SetCoords(I,-∞,0), If(SelectedElement(Parallels)=="VE ∥ h", SetCoords(E,∞,0), 0))))

input.a0: If[e ≠ e ∨ abs(e) ≟ Infinity, n + (k * (n - p)), 1 / mixn(k) + e]
If[e ≠ e ∨ abs(e) ≟ Infinity, n - (k * (n - p)), 1 / mixp(k) + e]
If[e ≠ e ∨ abs(e) ≟ Infinity, n - (k * (p - n)), If[n ≠ n ∨ abs(n) ≟ Infinity, ω, If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, e, e - ((e - n) * dl^((-k)))]]]
If[e ≠ e ∨ abs(e) ≟ Infinity, n + (k * (p - n)), If[n ≠ n ∨ abs(n) ≟ Infinity, e, If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, ω, e - ((e - n) * dl^(k))]]]

If[e ≠ e ∨ abs(e) ≟ Infinity, d - ((d - n) * cr^((-k))), If[d ≠ d ∨ abs(d) ≟ Infinity, e - (e - n) / cr^((-k)), If[n ≠ n ∨ abs(n) ≟ Infinity, e + (d - e) / (1 - cr^((-k))), If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, d + (e - d) / (1 - 1 / cr^((-k))), e + (d - e) / (1 - ((d - n) / (e - n) * cr^((-k))))]]]]

If[e ≠ e ∨ abs(e) ≟ Infinity, d - ((d - n) * cr^(k)), If[d ≠ d ∨ abs(d) ≟ Infinity, e - (e - n) / cr^(k), If[n ≠ n ∨ abs(n) ≟ Infinity, e + (d - e) / (1 - cr^(k)), If[p ≠ p ∨ abs(p) ≟ Infinity, d + (e - d) / (1 - 1 / cr^(k)), e + (d - e) / (1 - ((d - n) / (e - n) * cr^(k)))]]]]
